task: Sync data from AnkiWeb to AnkiDroid
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the data from AnkiWeb is successfully synced to AnkiDroid.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Sync from AnkiWeb"
By touching the "Sync from AnkiWeb" button, the user is taken to the login screen where they can enter their AnkiWeb account details to sync their data. (page changed from Introduction to Login)
